original_text: And as soon as he saw her, he tore his clothes and said, “Alas, my daughter! You have brought me very low, and you have become the cause of great trouble to me. For I have opened my mouth to the Lord, and I cannot take back my vow.”
korean_text: 입다가 이를 보고 자기 옷을 찢으며 이르되 어찌할꼬 내 딸이여 너는 나를 참담하게 하는 자요 너는 나를 괴롭게 하는 자 중의 하나로다 내가 여호와를 향하여 입을 열었으니 능히 돌이키지 못하리로다 하니

sentences.original_text: And as soon as he saw her,
he tore his clothes and said,
You have brought me very low,
and you have become the cause of great trouble to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게 큰 근심의 원인이 되었다.

sentences.original_text: For I have opened my mouth to the Lord,
and I cannot take back my vow.”
